fields.description:
## Task description

Right now the filtering is divided for application discovery (normal search and hidden in configuration). We need to extend it and unify it.

[Design](https://internal-system/design/BVwjGDjelz3CwV9ITXZE8I/Handoff---App-Discovery-Enhancements-for-v1.0?node-id=1-5&p=f&t=eWygsPQR630GTVTc-0)

## Background

Customers have described their approach to prioritize which applications they want to secure next. One of the approaches is to focus on applications that use a specific port. For example, an admin wants to narrow entitlements for SSH access, or database management ports, and so on. To simply their experience, the administrator needs the ability to filter the list of discovered apps by port(s).

## Definition of done

Search ability according to design suggestion

## Limitation

Saving searches will be split out to a separate thing.

An SDP Administrator wants to identify and focus on building entitlements for applications they deem important. This work is made a little more difficult by the fact that the important apps are buried within the hundreds, even thousands of other discovered applications. The SDP admin needs more control over how much "noise" appears in the results.
